https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k8hlC8dEGQjo1nokhbhG0X3U3Vo.jpg United Kingdom, March 24, 1954. Ten years before the decriminalization of homosexuality, journalist Peter Wildeblood and his friends Lord Montagu and Michael Pitt-Rivers are convicted and imprisoned for indecency and sodomy. Against the Law
